string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: HEAD: hide total stats by default, split limit type "costs" into "costs (excl.)" and "costs (incl.)", hide amount for "total merger plans", include/exclude numbers for MMS
v3.8.1: fix limit calculation for cost limits, fix mixed plans merging data plans, fix cost in mixed plans merging other plans
v3.8: show users\' rules in app, fix custom bill mode settings, update translation
v3.7.2: fix import of rules with <longdescription>
v3.7.1: fix cost in merged plans (reset stats please), fix progress bar size for android 3+, some more fixes

v3.7: fix limit breaking calls/data, fix cost settings help for plans without limit, merge data in mixed plans, hide progressbar for unlimited bill periods, strip anything but first x seconds, deleting last call will stay deleted until reset stats, fix "$amp;" in exports, fix numbers/hours imports, fix hidden help/summary, fix float cost limits, minor fixes
v3.6.4: fix FC on some samsung phones, fix out of memory exception, minor fixes
v3.6.3: basic dual sim support, export/impor XML file, fix moving plans/rules, add widget for "last log", fix some FCs, minor fixes
v3.6.2: fix FC when exporting rules, fix some more settings
v3.6.1: fix cost settings
v3.6: export logs as csv file, reimplement preferences, fix minor bugs, update translations
v3.5.1: fix some FCs, fix dark theme, fix titles in main view
v3.5: update abs 4.0, prepare for jelly bean, fix some FCs
v3.4.2: fix 31d bill period, update translations
v3.4.1: show past bill periods as 100%, fix import/export of rules with new and old bill periods

v3.4: add bill period length 14d 15d 31d 1m+1d, fix merged cost limits, minor UI fixes, remove stale widgets, text in number groups, fix prepaid cost in widget, show up to 20plans in "ask for plans" activity
v3.3.1: fix FC on android 1.6

v3.3: fix FC on android 1.6, fix sorting plans/rules, fix sum of cost for multi bill period plans, fix accuracy of data stats (esp. for samsung devices), fix widget for galaxy nexus, configure existing widgets, add widget for bill period, show intro for new users, data stats for acer e130
v3.2.2: fix FC, update translation
v3.2.1: fix FC, fix unlimited bill modes, minor fixes, update translation
v3.2: fix setting text size, fix donation view, fix date and cost format in logs view, improve performance
v3.1: RECALCULATON OF STATS NEEDED: disable rules, more filters in logs view, major change in design, major change in database queries, update translations
v3.0: generic traffic for FroYo+ devices, import rule sets from sd card
v3.0rc15: fix data stats, fix some minor FCs
v3.0rc14: simple preferences for default rule set, reimport default rule set, exlucde numbers for default rule set, add support for a601 and htc thunderbolt, update translations, minor fixes
v3.0rc13: fix for samsung phones, translate default rule set
v3.0rc12: fix for samsung galaxy 2
v3.0rc11: show icon, small widget (thanks to luca niccoli for both), update translations
v3.0rc10: set text size/color in widget, set background color in widget, add support for LG-P990, update translation, rename data stats by default
v3.0rc9: Add support for GT-S5830 and possible all future samsung devices, major inner changes, update translations
v3.0rc8: fix an other sunday bug, allow to split messages at fixed 160 chars, fix messages to yourself, add support for GT-I5510, fix custom currency symbol
v3.0rc7: fix data logs, fix sunday, fix limit+cost for merged+mixed plans, add remote number for MMS, update translations, add help
v2.9.6: set custom delimiter, add mon-fri for hour groups, allow smaller than 1 units in mixed plans

v2.9.5: set date+time for start of billing period, improve data logging, match (inter-)national numbers (enter your prefix in preferences), show today\'s stats, allow multi bill period merger, show call info after hanging up
v2.9.4: hide progress bars, add bill periods: 4,5,6,12 month, strip leading zeros, hide no cost plans
v2.9.3: Integrate with sipdroid, default update interval: 60m, fix MMS counter, fix mixed+merged limits, progressbar color, add chinese translation
v2.9.2: Delete old logs (default: 90d), multiselection on groups, fix NPE

v2.9.1: Fix cost for long sms, fix cost when reaching limit, set name/shortname for widget, show cost in widget, show billperiod in widget, settable sizes, don\'t bill first x seconds, merge plans, hide empty plans
v2.8.10: Integration with WebSMS, set custom locale
v2.8.9: clean groups in rules, fix numbergroups, fix adding logs, fix import from file, reduce collected traffic data
v2.8.8: fix for GT-I5500, fix cost for data, decimal limit, add turkish translation
v2.8.7: Fix length of billing period
v2.8.6: Fix some FCs, hide total stats, prepaid plans, set textsize, manipulate logs by hand
v2.8.5: Fix default displaying values for pans/rules
v2.8.4: Fix some FCs, fix number groups with more than one entry, readd druch, spanish and portuguese translations
v2.8.3: Fix exclude numbers
v2.8.2: Simplify rules (You must reset them!), fix export, fix NPEs, set update interval, set beginning of record
v2.8.1: Add default rule sets, reduce complexity for simple setups, some changes to gui, force internal install
v2.7.3: Fix uneditable fields, fix FC for empty bill modes, allow to hide title bar, readd polish+russion translation
v2.7.2: History, alert, widget, total expense, ...
v2.7.1: Custom date format, currency format/symbol; speedup boot/shutdown process, changing color of limit bars, new screens for plans/rules
v2.7.0: Initial alpha of Call Meter 3G\n\tMajor architecture refactoring
